data.text:
@thecraiger01 @JonNoHPeterson @WCCO He probably tried.

He tried a lot of things that were constantly being shot down.

@Mike86210 @JonNoHPeterson @WCCO How also do you explain ICU and hospital beds near or maxing capacity in most hospitals across the country during the past two years, especially during Covid case spikes? Hospitals lying?
@Mike86210 @JonNoHPeterson @WCCO Excess deaths do not require any distinction for Covid deaths. You don’t get to plead ignorance now. Answer the question.
@Mike86210 @JonNoHPeterson @WCCO And the trump justice department didn’t investigate or prosecute doctors and hospitals for this? #rabbithole

@thecraiger01 @JonNoHPeterson @WCCO I know what that means and I can't answer that without knowing an actual true number of the people who died OF Covid.  If I had to guess the actual number of people who died OF Covid is probably less than 1% of the deaths they've deemed "Covid deaths".

@Mike86210 @JonNoHPeterson @WCCO Not playing this stupid game. You clearly don’t understand comorbidities. Don’t dodge the excess deaths. What is your explanation for the hundreds of thousands of excess deaths the last 2 yrs?
@thecraiger01 @JonNoHPeterson @WCCO First tell me how many actually died OF Covid not WITH Covid.

@Mike86210 @JonNoHPeterson @WCCO There’s zero evidence to support your claim. And to think doctors en masse were committing Medicare fraud at the risk of fines or jail is insane. You still haven’t explained excess deaths.
@JonNoHPeterson @Mike86210 @WCCO At the risk of criminal and civil penalties, doctors were committing medicare fraud across the country?
